short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Login through Duo Mobile in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clicking on the extension logs you in through Duo Mobile. You can customize your security preferences to login hands-free or review each login attempt like the official app.

# FAQ
➤ How do I set it up?
Auto 2FA provides simple instructions to generate a Duo activation QR code that it will automatically scan and then store as your new Android or iOS virtual tablet.

➤ Is this secure?
Yes, but use at your own risk. Extensions are protected by the modern security of your browser, but it ultimately relies on your security practices. Visit the GitHub repository for details.

➤ How do I uninstall?
Right click Auto 2FA and select remove from Chrome/Edge. You'll need to revisit your organization's Duo Mobile devices page to remove it as a login device.

➤ Any technical details?
Checkout the repository for documentation and source code.

Auto 2FA is an independent project and is not recognized, endorsed, or affiliated with Duo Mobile or Cisco Technology. All product names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners.
